com.netflix.genie.core.jpa.entities

Class JobEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.core.jpa.entities.BaseEntity
      • com.netflix.genie.core.jpa.entities.CommonFieldsEntity
        • com.netflix.genie.core.jpa.entities.JobEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class JobEntity
extends CommonFieldsEntity
    Representation of the state of a Genie 3.0 job.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
